shortdesc.i: This event is fired by the system. If you want to listen to the event you can do so using the document.addEventListener function and remove the listener using the document.removeEventListener function. The resume event is triggered whenever the application is retrieved from the background.

dd.p: The callback function that will be invoked on the resume event.

p.pre:
<script type="text/javascript">

                function onResume() {
                    alert("The app is resumed.");
                }

                document.addEventListener("resume", onResume);

                </script>
